Description:
Key responsibilities of this position are to provide leadership of pre-commissioning activities. He/She will lead the development and implementation of the Pre-commissioning plan for project. On a day-to-day basis, Pre-Commissioning Manager will collaborate with Air Products Construction and Contractor team members, to ensure that the pre-commissioning activities are progressed. Specific Job Functions of this position are:Leads and executes the Pre-Commissioning activities.
Review and familiarization of Company required scope of work, drawings, project specifications and standards related to Pre-Commissioning work and handover scope.
Prepares and generates the pre-commissioning procedures for the project.
Lead the development of Pre-Commissioning method statement, including overall philosophy.
Assist in the development of documentation or Dossier
Comply to Company policies and rules and safety requirements.
Accountable for all Pre-Commissioning activities under his / her control are duly performed in accordance with the stated procedures, in conformity with the safety rules and as per the project requirements.
Be responsible for the supervision of the Pre-commissioning internal and Subcontractors resources and to co- ordinate the specific work scopes
Identify the Pre-Commissioning personnel, equipment, and consumables, philosophy for assigned scope.
Prepare scope of work and Material Requisition (MR)/Service Requisition (SR) documents.
Follow-up with awarded subcontractor (daily), review/approval of Pre-Commissioning subcontractor project specific procedures, equipment spread, and ensure compliance with the required scope of work and specifications
Lead all Pre-Commissioning internal and external technical interfaces with project team, Pre-Commissioning Subcontractors, Client, and Third-Party Contractor. Report on status of work, potential delays, problems, and so forth.
Attend and participate in project risk analysis meetings, constructability reviews, sessions, operation readiness review, and safety workshops, covering Pre-Commissioning activities as required
Manage all Technical Queries (TQ) and Non-Conformance Reports (NCR) related to Pre-Commissioning scope. Providing technical justification for Technical Queries (TQ) and Non-Conformance Reports (NCR) and ensure the TQs and NCRs are addressed / closed out.
Ensure as-built documentation is received, review and close-out per schedule.
Compile and present to department lesson learned for Pre-Commissioning activities on the project.
Provide formal and informal reporting of progress and status.Skills
Skills:
Previous experience managing Pre-Commissioning on capital construction projects in the $1B range
Demonstrated leadership and strong interpersonal skills
Leadership of both construction engineering and site construction teams
Ability to communicate at all levels of the organization at construction site
Experienced in in the full cycle of construction activities from development through production. 
Proven Record of success in safety, environmental, quality, employee involvement, team building, and diversity.
Construction, engineering, or management university degree or equivalent experience
Minimum of 15 years construction and engineering experience
Five (5) or more years of Pre-Commissioning Manager experience or equivalent

Preferred.Residence Location: All Arab Countries; All GCC Countries; India
